FoxFi (WiFi Tether w/o Root)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=FoxFi+Software" title="FoxFi Software">FoxFi Software</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.foxfi"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaEwoREg8KCWNvbS5mb3hmaRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  FoxFi (WiFi mode) now comes with PdaNet for USB or Bluetooth mode. You can now share your cell phone's Internet connection with your computers or tablets through either USB, Bluetooth or even WiFi Hotspot on compatible phone models (see below). Most importantly it does not require the extra tether plan (mobile hotspot plan) from your carrier or rooting your Android phone.<p>Free edition of FoxFi will require you to restart after some usage, otherwise it is same as full version.</p><p>Sprint and AT&amp;T may not allow you to install our app from Play Store, please install the apk file directly from http://pdanet.co/android, or install on the computer side from http://pdanet.co/a</p><p><br>======WiFi Mode==========<br>Due to lockdowns through each phone system update, WiFi mode will only be allowed on a short list of compatible devices. As of April 2015, IN GENERAL,  <br> ---Verizon Samsung phones (S3/4/5, Note 2/3/4) , Verizon LG phones (G2/3) and Verizon Sony phones (Z3) are supported with all Android versions including Android 5.0/5.1.  <br> ---Verizon HTC phones (M7/8) will only work on Android 4.1 ~ 4.4.<br> ---Verizon Motorola phones will only work on Android 4.3 or below.<br> ---Straight Talk phones will only work if it uses Verizon and is one of the above. <br> ---AT&amp;T Samsung phones will only work on Android 4.2 or below.<br> ---Other carriers/phones will only work if they still have Android 4.0 or below.<br> ---For all other phones, use USB mode or Bluetooth mode instead. If you absolutely need a WiFi hotspot, see below for "WiFi Share".<br> <br>*To get around lockdowns on WiFi mode FoxFi may prompt you to install a certificate on your phone, this will cause the Android system to enforce a screen lock and show a security message in notification. For more detail and steps to remove screen lock please visit http://pdanet.co/wifi. <br>*If you receive a message asking for a "password for credential strorage" this is due to a bug in the Android system. Please see steps to clear this message at http://pdanet.co/wifi</p><p>======USB Mode=========<br>USB mode works on almost all Android phones. It allows connection from Windows PC or Mac. In addition, PdaNet comes with a "WiFi Share" feature that can further turn the Windows PC into a WiFi Hotspot so that you can connect other devices to it and share your phone's Internet connection.</p><p>*T-Mobile or MetroPCS users can only use USB mode with "Hide Tether Usage" enabled in PdaNet. This will break Netflix however.<br>*If your phone is not recognized by your computer after connecting USB, please see http://pdanet.co/driver<br>*Please treat Windows tablets (non RT) the same as Windows PC.</p><p>======Bluetooth Mode======<br>Bluetooth mode allows connection from Windows PC, Android tablets (excludes Android 4.4) or devices that supports Bluetooth DUN.</p><p>*A system bug in Android 4.4 for tablets will break Bluetooth mode, this is fixed in Android 5.0 or later.<br>*For Android tablets it is possible only the browser app will work in Bluetooth mode. That is because other apps may be looking for wifi or cell phone connection and not recognize the Bluetooth Internet. <br>*One way around the above two issues is to find a wifi hotspot to connect the tablet to at the same time (such wifi hotspot does not need to provide Internet access).</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" You can control mouse, keyboard, multimedia, presentation or power system commands.<p>DOWNLOAD SERVER:<br>http://www.androidremotepc.com/downloads/</p><p>Tutorial, support and general information you'll get on the website:<br>http://www.androidremotepc.com/</p><p>Requirements:<br>• Java SE - JRE (32-bit, x86 platform): http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html</p><p>How to connect:<br>1. Download the server to your computer<br>2. Turn on Bluetooth on the PC<br>3. Extract downloaded file and launch Remote PC Server.jar<br>4. Run the application in your mobile. Choose Bluetooth connection −&gt; select the computer from Paired Devices −&gt; wait for connection<br>• Detailed tutorials: http://www.androidremotepc.com/tutorial/.</p><p>It is a trial version of PowerPoint, OO Impress, Adobe Reader) with stopwatch<br>• Power system control</p><p>Support the following operating systems:<br>• Windows 7 &amp; 8 (x86, x64)<br>• Windows Vista (x86, x64)<br>• is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="info.guardianproject.browser"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Orweb是Android平台最隐私和匿名的浏览器，您可以浏览任何网站，尽管您要访问的网站是审查/监控或者是隐藏的网站。<br>★ 接受无替代： Orweb是Android平台最安全的浏览器，在您访问期间，Orweb将会把流量加密并通过世界各地的电脑多次反弹，可以躲避追踪和网络审查，而不是使用您喜欢的VPN和代理。这个过程可能需要一些时间，不过为了最强壮的网络匿名性和身份保护而占用这点时间是值得的。<br>★ 规避防火墙和限制：您的办公室，学校或者国家（地区）是否和谐了一些网站？这将不会再发生。Orweb可以绕过几乎所有种类的网络限制。<br>★ 匿名地浏览：纽约时报说过：“当一个通讯经过Tor后，你将永远也不知道它来自哪里。” 虽然没有东西是100%完美的，不过Orweb是在Android平台是最尽可能的匿名。<br>★ 你可以相信的隐私：电子前沿基金会(EFF)说：“Tor项目是一个有开创性的项目，可以帮助用户在任何地点提升他们的在线通讯安全。”<br>***重要***<br>需要免费的Orbot插件。在 http://goo.gl/IzfFG 下载<br>***特性***<br>★ 无历史记录：Orweb不会存储您访问过的网站的任何信息。<br>★ 可塑性的Cookie控制：您可以防止您浏览过的网站放置任何Cookies(因为它们可以追踪您的网络活动)，可选择地允许他们或允许任何网站建立cookies.<br>★ 伪装您的设备：您可以选择让网站页面识别您的设备类型为任何您想让他识别的，比如用手机浏览网站可以让他识别成您在用电脑上这个网站。。<br>★ 限制Javascript脚本攻击：Javascript是很多种恶意软件的共用攻击方法，JS被默认禁用了。<br>★ 限制FLASH泄密：Orweb尝试防止您浏览的网站加载Flash，同时封锁很多种安全威胁。<br>★ 易用：您只需点击几次鼠标就可以自由，匿名的网上冲浪了。了解更多请看：https://guardianproject.info/howto/browsefreely<br>★ 开源：我们的源代码是透明的，您可以看看也可以加入我们来帮助Orweb变得更好：https://github.com/guardianproject/orweb <br>★ 语言自由：Orweb当期支持的语言：Arabic (العربية), Chinese (中文简体), Dutch (Nederlands), English, Esperanto, Farsi (فارسی), French (Français), German (Deutsch), Greek (Ελληνικά), Hungarian (Magyar Nyelv), Italian (Italiano), Norwegian (Norsk), Russian (Русский), Spanish (Español), Swedish (Svensk), and Tibetan (བོད་སྐད།).<br>没看到您的语言么？加入我们来翻译这款app<br>https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/orweb<br>***了解更多***<br>★ 关于我们：Guardian项目是一群为了更好地明天而制造安全移动应用程序和开源代码的开发者们。<br>★ 我们的网站：http://GuardianProject.info Linphone Video  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Belledonne+communications" title="Belledonne communications">Belledonne communications</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.linphone"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDG9yZy5saW5waG9uZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Belledonne Communications today announced the new release of Linphone for Android. Linphone is an open source internet phone or Voice Over IP phone (VoIP), compatible with the SIP protocol.  It was the very first open-source linux application using SIP and it has became one of the most popular open-source SIP dialer for mobile platforms.<p>The new version V2.0 for Android, iPhone and iPad, available immediately, includes significant enhancements in the new ergonomic shape with a curved face interface, the integration of the address book and an account creation assistant. </p><p>Three major new capabilities have been added : a text messaging feature (chat) with delivery status notification, multiple calls and audio conferencing. In addition, Linphone supports now audio with speex , G711 ,ILBC, GSM, SILK, G722, OPUS, and video with VP8, H264 and mpeg4 codecs.</p><p>Exit button is located in the Settings-&gt;About page.</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.linphone" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=org.linphone" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.9 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 77.79614448547363%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.linphone"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDG9yZy5saW5waG9uZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div><div class="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-docid="sg.bigo" data-original-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-short-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="sg.bigo" data-server-cookie="CAIaEQoPEg0KB3NnLmJpZ28QARgD" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaEQoPEg0KB3NnLmJpZ28QARgD" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=sg.bigo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Bigo - I've already logged in, but see the message "This account is not activated to access Ingress".<br>A. This is a known bug with the Ingress website. Choosing "Reload" from the Options Menu will fix the issue.</p><p>Q. Does this app use the IITC Plugin/Mod?<br>A. Nope. We're currently using the stock intel map. This is a safer bet for new players, and reflects the official Ingress experience as released by Niantic.</p><p>=== Feedback ===</p><p>Your feedback is welcome! SYNchat Messenger  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SYNCHAT" title="SYNCHAT">SYNCHAT</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tfs.synchat"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGQoXEhUKD2NvbS50ZnMuc3luY2hhdBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  • SYNchat - A Very Private Messenger - uses ALIASES, not phone numbers, not PINs or classic usernames. Exchange text messages, voice notes, pictures and videos using your data plan or WiFi. Alias to Alias Chats.<p>• Direct and instant in-app registration: choose an Alias, protect it with a password, that is all. No email verification, no phone number check, no access to you phone-book, location or to any other private information.</p><p>• You can have an unlimited number of ALIASES on SYNchat Messenger. They are not linked to a master ID or between them. You can delete any ALIAS instantly or change its Privacy mode from Public (Anyone can contact you) to Private (only Contacts you added on your list can reach you). </p><p>• Chat in Style. ALIAS is Username 2.0: use Letters, Numbers, Spaces and Special Characters - but only Letters and Numbers count. Special characters (spaces, comas, hyphens, underscores, etc.) or letter capitalization are used for your Aliases "Styling": they will be visible to others if you used them when registering, but they can be omitted in any operation on SYNchat Messenger.</p><p>• If your ALIAS is "James Dean", you are also: "jamesdean", "James.Dean" or "james-dean" when someone adds you as a Contact. Your ALIAS will be shown to your Contacts including the Styling Characters, spaces, uppercase – but in order to add you, anybody can write or omit them: if the Letters (not case sensitive) and Numbers are correct, is fine. SYNchat Messenger will automatically update the Alias Styling  - your ALIAS will be shown to your chat partners exactly as you registered it, regardless of how they entered it in "Add Contact" field.</p><p>• Instead of dull classic Username, an ALIAS have Style. Your Style. Vanity Alias, Cool Alias, Disposable Alias. Your choice. As many choices as you like on SYNchat Messenger.</p><p>• You do not have to remember exactly how anyone's ALIAS is written; if you accidentally insert a space, a dot or a comma when adding a Contact, is OK - SYNchat Messenger will automatically make the corrections.</p><p>•  No "typing", "online", "last seen" status shown. <br> <br>•  Double tap to "ROGER THAT!" Double tap on a received message and the sender will receive a confirmation: the messages status arrows turns blue. SYNchat do not automatically shows "read" status of messages - for privacy reasons.</p><p>• Hide all the pictures within the app with a single touch. Mute SYNchat notifications without affecting  phone alerts.</p><p>Discover more at http://www.synchat.net/</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span OpenVPN Installer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Friedrich+Sch%C3%A4uffelhut" title="Friedrich Schäuffelhut">Friedrich Schäuffelhut</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="de.schaeuffelhut.android.openvpn.installer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaNAoyEjAKKmRlLnNjaGFldWZmZWxodXQuYW5kcm9pZC5vcGVudnBuLmluc3RhbGxlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  You need a root device the tun/tap driver and busybox.<p>OpenVPN Installer will try to install openvpn (2.1.1) in /system/xbin or /system/bin. Your mileage might vary depending on your phone.</p><p>Androids ifconfig implementation fails to configure the tunnel device correctly. So you need ifconfig provided by busybox. Try a BusyBox Installer from the market.<br> <br>The path to ifconfig is a compile time option to openvpn and can not be changed at runtime. This installer includes multiple binaries with preconfigured ifconfig locations.</p><p>The preferred way to install openvpn is to put busybox at /system/xbin/busybox and then choose openvpn preconfigured for '/system/xbin/busybox ifconfig'.</p><p>Finally /system/xbin/bb is not needed anymore! href="/store/apps/details?id=com.orphansecure.freedom" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.orphansecure.freedom" title="Freedom!"> 409.    Freedom!  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Orphan+Secure" title="Orphan Secure">Orphan Secure</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.orphansecure.freedom"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5vcnBoYW5zZWN1cmUuZnJlZWRvbRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The "FREEDOM!" app is a globally available human trafficking mobile application that empowers individual victims and communities to anonymously and safely report cases of human/child sex trafficking in 10 languages at three main levels:<br>     - Victims<br>     - Trafficker<br>     - Suspicious Activity<p>The "FREEDOM!" app is part of Orphan Secure's big data initiative that aims to identify and rescue victims of human trafficking as well as target human trafficking organizations and bring them to justice in cooperation with trusted law enforcement agencies and other NGOs. Information sent via the "FREEDOM!" app is received by Orphan Secure and the Anti-Human Trafficking Intelligence Cell (AHTIC) where the information is then processed, analyzed and disseminated to allow for direct action by interested parties.</p><p></p><p>WHY WE COLLECT - YOU ARE OUR EYES!</p><p>It is not possible for us or another trusted partner in the fight against trafficking to be everywhere at once. That is why we need you and for you to use the app. With your help we can increase the reach of our information gathering and spread our net wider everyday to help identify victims and catch those criminals responsible for human / child sex trafficking.</p><p>The "FREEDOM!" app allows for individuals to be a part of a community based response, one of the most effective ways of combating any serious problem. Many have asked how they can be a part of this fight. Be more observant and help us put an end to modern day slavery!!</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 注意！在安装程序的付费版本，请务必先移除的免费版本。<br>应用程序被设计用来记录电话交谈。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 简单和直观的界面。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 扑朔迷离菜单。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 简单，清晰，可靠。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 没有广告！<p>一重要！</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;请注意，在某些手机上，通话录音不工作或录音质量较差。这个限制是因为这样的事实，在一些国家禁止未经用户同意他的通话记录。一些手机制造商，在硬件无法记录！此限制不依赖于应用程序，而不是一个在程序中的bug 。的事实，你的手机不支持此功能，请不要把一个坏的评分！<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;所有的问题和建议，请发送电子邮件至palladium.dev.corp @ gmail.com 。<br>如果您发现错误翻译成任何语言，请联系我们，我们将纠正这些错误。</p><p>免费使用计划时期已经过去了。在这一点上，在免费版本可以记录只有一个电话。记录在付费版本可用的所有电话。</p><p><br>二。特点：</p><p>✔启用或禁用自动通话录音。<br>✔能够手动记录（按钮谈话时） （ PRO ）<br>✔能力账目附注（ PRO ）<br>✔通过电子邮件发送条目<br>✔自动删除旧记录（ PRO ）<br>✔新的联系人照片（ PRO ）<br>✔密码登录到应用程序（ PRO ）<br>✔搜索记录来电<br>✔隐藏的音频文件（ PRO ）<br>✔播放一键录音（ PRO ）<br>✔选择三种格式之一，输出文件<br>✔呼叫过滤器（白名单和黑名单）<br>✔自动重启<br>✔选择存储记录<br>✔更改语言<br>✔选择记录源（麦克风，语音来电，来电者的声音，两个通道）<br>✔播放的音频播放器</p><p><br>III 。重要！运行程序：</p><p>✔录制线仅支持在手机上，其核心支持双向录音。在大多数设备上记录只是一个麦克风（一个后果 - 录音质量较差）</p><p>✔安装之前，请关闭其他程序记录电话交谈。<br>✔安装完整版本之前，一定要删除的免费版本。<br>✔如果你不记录或写不好，录音尝试不同的组合（不同的手机最佳的设置是不同的）<br>✔要更改语言，关闭记录（按钮） ，然后重新启动程序。<br>✔默认情况下，所有来电都被保存在您的手机SD卡上的文件夹CALL_RECORDS 。<br>✔如果发生错误，请尝试以下操作：<br>1 ）重设手机<br>2）删除该程序，并重新安装<br>3）删除应用程序数据（设置 - &gt;应用程序 - &gt; “通话录音” - &gt;删除数据）<br>4）打开/关闭记录（在左上角的按钮）</p><p>语言支持：<br>俄语，英语，德语，意大利语，法语，印地语，日语，韩语，中文，西班牙语，葡萄牙语，泰语，阿拉伯语，越南语。</p><p>渐渐地，程序会添加新的特性和功能。<br>图为付费版本的程序。<br>•如果您正在使用录音线，给我一个指定的E-mail地址，电话在邮件中详细介绍！ href="/store/apps/details?id=com.palmerperformance.DashCommand" title="DashCommand (OBD ELM Scanner)"> 421.    DashCommand (OBD ELM Scanner)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Palmer+Performance+Engineering" title="Palmer Performance Engineering">Palmer Performance Engineering</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.palmerperformance.DashCommand"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5wYWxtZXJwZXJmb3JtYW5jZS5EYXNoQ29tbWFuZBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  DashCommand is an app for your car. It turns your Android phone or tablet into an advanced display for your engine data.<p>Want to know why the check engine light keeps going on? Check it with DashCommand.</p><p>Want to know what your horsepower, torque, or acceleration is, in real time? Display it with DashCommand.</p><p>Want to monitor and improve your gas mileage or fuel consumption as you drive? Do it with DashCommand.</p><p>Ever wished you had your own customizable gauges, showing only the data you were interested in? DashCommand can help.</p><p>NOTE: The free version of DashCommand is evaluation mode only. Full functionality requires an in-app purchase through Google Play.</p><p>--- SEMA Show 1st runner-up for best mobile electronics product.<br>--- Four time SEMA Global Media Award winner!</p><p>DISCLAIMER: DashCommand requires a compatible third party hardware interface, purchased separately, to communicate with the vehicle.</p><p>DashCommand supports all OBD-II and EOBD compliant vehicles sold worldwide. Please verify that your vehicle is OBD-II/EOBD compliant before purchasing!</p><p>Compatible with Bluetooth ELM327 OBD-II hardware.  For suggested hardware see : http://palmerperformance.com/hardware</p><p>-----------------------------------</p><p>Get the benefit of multiple gauges without the overwhelming clutter and the expense!</p><p>(Note: Not all OBD-II compliant vehicles will have support for all of these parameters)</p><p>Performance gauges:<br>- engine speed<br>- corrected vehicle speed<br>- open/closed loop<br>- boost/vacuum combo gauge<br>- acceleration (and braking)<br>- torque</p><p>Fuel economy gauges:<br>- inst. fuel economy<br>- avg fuel economy<br>- avg fuel economy over 3 time periods<br>- distance to empty<br>- time to empty<br>- fuel level %<br>- fuel remaining in tank<br>- fuel flow rate gauge</p><p>Engine gauges:<br>- timing (spark advance)<br>- engine coolant temp.<br>- intake air temp.<br>- ambient air temp.<br>- manifold absolute pressure<br>- mass air flow<br>- fuel trims, short and long term<br>- percent engine load<br>- catalyst temp.<br>- fuel pressure<br>- lambda gauge<br>- air/fuel ratio</p><p>DashCommand also contains a sophisticated trip computer that maintains stats for up to 5 trips.<br>- distance travelled<br>- fuel consumed<br>- avg fuel economy<br>- fuel cost<br>- elapsed time<br>- drive time<br>- average carbon dioxide emission rate<br>- total carbon dioxide emission<br>- start date &amp; time<br>- number of fillups<br>- avg fuel flow rate<br>- avg driving speed<br>- avg trip speed<br>- avg boost/vacuum<br>- avg engine speed<br>- max acceleration<br>- max engine power and torque at wheels<br>- number of stops<br>- max fuel flow rate<br>- max speed<br>- idle time<br>- max boost/vacuum<br>- max engine speed<br>- max braking acceleration<br>- max engine torque<br>- % distance travelled while not in gear<br>- % distance travelled in each gear<br>- % distance travelled in non-optimal gear<br>- % time spent while not in gear<br>- % time spent in each gear<br>- % time spent while in a non-optimal gear</p><p>Emissions Testing:<br>- Read and clear diagnostic trouble codes<br>- IM Readiness status</p><p><br>Additional Features:</p><p>- Professional skidpad showing lateral and accel/braking Gs with min/max indicators<br>- Race track visually maps out your location, acceleration and braking as you drive laps around the track allows you to visually analyze different race track laps to see how acceleration and braking changed from lap to lap thus helping you to improve your lap times on your next outing.<br>- Inclinometer shows rolling angle and vehicle pitch for off-roading.<br>- Full support for OBD-II diagnostics, find out why your check-engine light is on and clear diagnostic trouble codes (DTCs)<br>- Data logging, record and playback log files showing OBD-II and acceleration data</p><p>Also compatible with the Pioneer AppRadio 2</p><p>Manufacturer-specific data is available for select vehicles, through In-App purchase.</p><p>-----------------------------------</p><p>Visit the DashCommand product page for more info:<br>http://www.dashcommand.com</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span Hushed - 免费号码、发短信、短信，和通话  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=AffinityClick+Inc." title="AffinityClick Inc.">AffinityClick Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" 获得一个北美免费HUSHED号码 – 现在可以在iPad上使用！<p>Hushed – 用于您的Android或者iPad设备的一次性电话号码。包括免费语音信箱、短信，和彩信。</p><p>为您的手机或者平板电脑提供无限数量的移动电话号码，这样，您就可以从世界各地发送短信或者进行语音通话了。Hushed是一款用于一次性电话号码的终极长途电话应用。现在，您想要获得多少可以任意处理的廉价本地或者国际长途电话号码都可以。</p><p>将号码绑定到任意Android设备上，然后从我们的应用拨打电话并使用一个“Hushed”一次性电话号码隐藏您的真实电话号码。我们提供许多不同的套餐计划，有7天的、30天的、90天的，还有365天的。当您购买了一个Hushed号码时，每个号码都附带有它自己的独立语音信箱。您想要获得多少个Hushed号码都可以，一旦用完后，便可以销毁它们。</p><p>### 保持隐私#### <br>Hused是隐私而且安全的！您想要获得多少个Hushed号码都可以，并且可以随时丢弃。将Hushed作为您的手机的一个隐私层，因为您购买的每个号码都决不会追溯到您的真实电话号码。使用Hushed，您就可以做自己想要做的人：给业务联系人、朋友、熟人，或者自己爱的人不同的电话号码。</p><p>在工作时不想被人打扰？只需将应用设为隐身模式，然后将所有来电都直接发送至语音信箱并关闭提醒就可以了。使用我们的PIN码上锁功能，就不会有人能够访问您的电话号码或者通话历史了。</p><p>当您在找新工作，却又不想收到求职公告栏的垃圾邮件时，Hushed便是您的理想选择！当您在出国时，是您用于各种项目的理想选择！现在，您可以将您的号码发布在Craigslist、Twitter，或者任何其它社交媒体网站上，同时又不用担心会受到垃圾信息的骚扰！现在，您不用再把自己的真实电话号码告诉任何人了 – 再也不用了。只需要使用您的Hushed号码，就可以保持隐私了。</p><p>###国际号码，有竞争力的价格### <br>使用Hushed没有漫游费用！只需使用该应用，然后利用您的手机无线连接或者3G/4G/LTE连接，就可以享受水晶般清晰的通话了。抱歉，我们不支持这些线路的短信息代码。</p><p>从以下任意国家购买一个Hushed号码：美国、加拿大、澳大利亚、奥地利、比利时、捷克共和国、丹麦、荷兰、法国、希腊、香港、日本、英国、爱尔兰、以色列、意大利、荷兰、新西兰、波兰、葡萄牙、罗马尼亚、西班牙、瑞典、瑞士、巴林、保加利亚、多米尼加共和国、爱沙尼亚、立陶宛、马尔他、秘鲁、斯洛伐克、巴西、塞浦路斯、萨尔瓦多、拉脱维亚、卢森堡、墨西哥、波多黎各，和南非。</p><p>从美国、加拿大和英国收发隐私短信。我们正在努力以使其它国家也能很快使用短信功能。</p><p>###透明的价格 ### <br>我们不会隐藏价格或者使用基于信用的系统埋藏价格。每个Hushed号码对我们来说都会有成本，所以，我们会通过 小额涨价转嫁成本。</p><p>您可以随时查看您的余额和开销历史记录。您可以将Hushed号码看作预付费号码，然后往您的帐户中存钱，我们便会根据您是往哪拨打的电话（本地或者国际）扣除您的使用费用。您可以在需要时充值。</p><p>北美一次性电话号码<br>* 语音<br>* 短信<br>* 包括语音信箱 <br>* 支持彩信（从美国、加拿大，和英国发送图片）/仅从（加拿大）接收图片。</p><p>从1.99美元起</p><p>国际一次性电话号码<br>* 语音<br>* 短信<br>* 包含语音信箱 Moreover, both you AND your friends (with whom you wish to exchange locations) must have the app installed and logged in to at least a social network.</p><p>Find My Friends allows you to exchange REAL-TIME locations on Google maps with your friends. Location exchange is visible only to you and your selected friends. The app's unique feature is that supports four different contact domains; Facebook, Google+, LinkedIn, and phone/tablet contacts. No account creation is required, the moment you launch Find My Friends, you may directly exchange locations with any of your friends who also have the app installed. </p><p>Find My Friends allows seamless location exchange from all supported social networks: for example, if you and your friend login to Facebook, Google+, and Linkedin with Find My Friends, you can find his/her location by selecting his/her Facebook profile, and he can ask for yours via your Google profile.</p><p>Find My Friends also offers the "location to browser" extremely useful feature; If desired, you can transmit your REAL-TIME location to ANY online device with a web-browser (e.g. smartphones, tablets, notebooks, desktop PCs). </p><p>You can also use Find My Friends to send constantly your location to close contacts (e.g. family members, spouse, good friends) even when you do not run the app.</p><p>You can purchase a subscription extension by 3, 6, 9 or 12 months. A valid subscription will remove all ads. </p><p>The Find My Friends main features are:</p><p>1. Unlimited location sharing with all your contacts on the map<br>2. Get REAL-TIME routing directions on the map<br>3. Send your REAL-TIME location to ANY online device with an internet browser<br>4. Send on the background your location to all selected close contacts<br>5. Define safe  / dangerous map zones and get notified when close contacts enter or exit them<br>6. Get notified when close contact are close by<br>7. Record all close contacts' activities<br>8. Powerful chatting<br>9. Access waypoints that friends send you, and get REAL-TIME routing directions on the map<br>10. See the current address of all your friends on the map<br>11. Send instantly your current location either on the map or as a waypoint<br>12. Remember where you parked your vehicle (yes, that too!)</p><p>Check also our tutorials at http://nliteapps.com/?page_id=5203<br>For questions, contact us at info@nliteapps.com.</p><p>Permissions usage (Please read also our privacy policy):<br>"Find accounts on the device": detect whether you have a Google+ account, in order to be able to +1 this app.<br>"Read your contacts": be able to read your phone/tablet contacts, so you can import them.<br>"View network connections / Full network access": check that your internet connection is functional, since otherwise the app cannot work.<br>"Use accounts on the device": ask authentication tokens from the official Facebook, Google+, LinkedIn and Twitter pages.<br>"Directly call phone numbers": place a direct call when tapping on the phone icon of a phone/tablet contact that you have imported.<br>"Precise location / Approximate location": pinpoint your location and exchange it with the contacts you select.<br>"External storage": save a backup of your contacts, in case you wish to migrate the app to a new device.<br>"Wifi/network state": inform user if the internet connection is ok<br>"Start on boot": if close contacts are enabled by the user, notify him/her that location transmission has started.<br>"Set alarm": if close contacts are enabled by the user, transmit periodically his/her location.<br>"Google Cloud Messaging": to Laban browser  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=VNG+Online" title="VNG Online">VNG Online</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.vng.android.zingbrowser"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG2NvbS52bmcuYW5kcm9pZC56aW5nYnJvd3NlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Nếu dùng phiên bản 1.0.16 hoặc cũ hơn, vui lòng xóa bản cũ để cài đặt phiên bản mới.<p>Laban browser là trình duyệt cho mobile với đầy đủ tính năng kết hợp với Laban.vn - cổng định hướng tìm kiếm, danh bạ web và Baomoi.com - website tổng hợp thông tin tiếng Việt tự động số 1 Việt Nam.</p><p>Các tính năng nổi bật của Laban browser:</p><p>* Danh bạ: truy cập các trang web phổ biến và có lượng người dùng cao nhất Việt Nam, và các tiện ích khác được giới thiệu bởi Laban.vn.<br>* Tìm kiếm nhanh hơn với gợi ý kết quả từ Google, được tích hợp ngay vào trong thanh địa chỉ.<br>* Đa cửa sổ: duyệt đồng thời và di chuyển qua lại giữa các trang một cách dễ dàng. Quản lý các cửa sổ dễ dàng với khả năng: đóng cửa sổ hiện hành, đóng tất cả trừ cửa sổ hiện hành, mở lại cửa sổ đã đóng, mở một link trên cửa sổ mới...<br>* Hỗ trợ điều khiển cử chỉ (gesture)<br>* Bookmark và History: truy cập vào các trang web yêu thích của bạn qua hỗ trợ chỉ mục đánh dấu và lịch sử.<br>* Truy cập nhanh: giúp truy cập ngay các trang web yêu thích nhất.<br>* Download: tải xuống đồng thời nhiều file cùng lúc, khả năng tải lại khi mạng chậm hoặc mất kết nối Internet.<br>* Chế độ đêm, điều chỉnh độ sáng giúp duyệt web tốt hơn vào ban đêm; chế độ duyệt toàn màn hình giúp tăng không gian hiển thị.<br>* Chế độ duyệt ẩn danh (incognito mode) giúp duyệt web an toàn hơn.<br>* Hỗ trợ đọc file PDF<br>* Quét và nhận dạng mã vạch (QR code).<br>* Themes: thay đổi nền hiển thị bằng màu sắc yêu thích.<br>* Tự động xoay màn hình dọc, ngang, hoặc giữ cố định.<br>* Xem và nghe video, nhạc từ Youtube, Zing Mp3, Zing TV... ngay trong trình duyệt.<br>* Tìm từ, sao chép, chia sẻ nội dung của đoạn văn bản trong trang; tìm kiếm cụm từ của trang trên Google.<br>* Sao chép, chia sẻ địa chỉ trang web qua Bluetooth, SMS hoặc email.<br>* Hỗ trợ hiển thị theo 2 ngôn ngữ: tiếng Việt (mặc định) hoặc tiếng Anh.<br>* Thay đổi và lưu lại các tùy chỉnh giúp duyệt web thuận tiện hơn cho những lần sử dụng sau.<br>* Tăng tốc tải trang, tăng tốc độ download file, chặn hiển thị quảng cáo không mong muốn với Laban proxy (thử nghiệm).</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.vng.android.zingbrowser" aria-hidden="true" 452.    Blacklist Plus  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Vlad+Lee" title="Vlad Lee">Vlad Lee</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.vladlee.blacklistplus"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS52bGFkbGVlLmJsYWNrbGlzdHBsdXMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  黑名單Plus是一個易於使用的呼叫攔截。您可以添加到黑名單中，不僅所有的通話和信息記錄聯繫人或電話號碼，而且開頭一定數字的任何電話號碼的整個範圍。任何格式的任何數字，可以被添加到對黑和白名單。 <p>黑名單Plus是一款功能強大的呼叫攔截。通過使用白名單和阻塞的各種模式，你將有機會準確界定人的圈子誰可以訪問你。調度選項還可以讓你設定你想要激活阻斷的時間，並防止意外的晚上來電，打擾你了。 </p><p>這個調用攔截器還提供了用於管理的閉鎖，如選項來阻止隱藏的數字，以及關閉通知，並設置密碼保護（僅適用於專業版）的選項，選項的整個範圍。 </p><p>黑名單Plus是一個完美的來電攔截，可以立即掛斷不必要的電話，或者乾脆關掉他們的聲音，這取決於塊的方法你選擇。無論你的選擇是什麼，你的手機的通話記錄將被清除阻塞調用的所有痕跡。 </p><p>所有關於阻塞調用的信息保存在應用程序的日誌。您將能夠在不離開程序撥打電話。您也可以關閉阻塞在任何時間，通過選擇適當的塊模式的呼叫。 </p><p>如果你不想讓別人知道你的黑名單，並能夠查看被阻止的呼叫日誌，可以使用密碼保護功能（僅適用於專業版）。 </p><p>有呼叫攔截的4塊模式： <br>- 黑名單 <br>- 除白名單 <br>- 所有的聯繫人除外 <br>- 所有號碼 </p><p>塊方法的選擇： <br>- 掛斷 <br>- 靜音 </p><p>其他功能： <br>- 白名單 <br>- 添加一個數字範圍到黑白名單 <br>- 用於阻塞調用選項 <br>- 阻斷隱藏號碼 <br>- 中華阻塞調用和消息 <br>- 設置密碼（可在Pro版本） </p><p>優點： <br>- 強大的呼叫攔截 <br>- 非常容易和穩定 <br>- 一個用戶友好的界面 <br>- 各種設置 </p><p>常問問題： <br>如何隱藏狀態欄圖標？ <br>您可以通過取消在應用程序的“設置”選項卡“顯示狀態欄圖標”選項隱藏狀態欄圖標。 </p><p><br>如果你對申請有任何疑問，請讓我們知道通過e-mail：support@vlmob.com</p><p><br>-------------------------</p><p>App type: Call blocker, <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=IO+Apps,+Inc." title="IO Apps, Inc.">IO Apps, Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.iodroidapps.btaf"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5pb2Ryb2lkYXBwcy5idGFmEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  通過藍牙的文件傳輸任何類型和數目。<br>我們的專業服務，通過藍牙共享文件是很不錯的選擇，現代化和安全。<p><br>BTAF (Bluetooth Transfer Any File), 是一種應用程序進行文件傳輸，可以傳輸任何類型的任何大小的文件通過藍牙。</p><p>基本上它是暴露。因此，多個用戶可以下載一次。允許選擇多個文件和發貨確認和下載。它躋身最常用的應用程序。</p><p><br>特點：<br>. 使用非常方便！零配置。<br>. 多選文件。<br>. 將文件發送到多個用戶同時進行。<br>. 從不同的用戶同時接收多個文件。<br>. 在相同的時間相同的用戶發送和接收。<br>. 確認發送文件。<br>. 確認文件下載。<br>. 包括它自己的文件瀏覽器 (File Selector)。<br>. 無需註冊或登錄。</p><p><br>我們優化這個應用程序，以確保您做出最佳使用藍牙。但請記住，，藍牙硬件限制。它所做的是建立一個單一的兩個設備（客戶端和服務器）之間的隧道。這是防止一個用戶一次發送多個文件。</p><p>然而，我們已經創建了一個替代此限制，壓縮一組文件，啟用多選。</p><p>關於航運速度是相對的藍牙設備。對於我們而言，我們已經滿足。</p><p><br>該應用程序包括用戶手冊：設置/幫助</p><p>享受它，</p><p><br>NOTE: <br>可与支持IMAP/SMTP/POP3的所有邮箱同步，免费的多账户一体邮件应用。 </p><p>1. 各种邮箱里的邮箱一次性收件。不仅仅是Daum，Gmail，Naver，Nate，学校和公司邮箱也一网打尽！ <br>2. 按住目录中的邮件，向左滑，立即保存或者删除。在设定中使用"滑动操作"进行设置。 <br>3. 阅读邮件时，向左右滑动直接查看上一封/下一封邮件。方便查看多个邮件。 <br>4. 只看我想看的邮箱。重要邮件，附件邮件，未读邮件，发给我的邮件， 都无需搜索，一眼尽扫。 <br>5. 可选择性地同步并只接受一部分信箱的通知。 <br>6. 未读邮件个数在图标上显示，并且可以只显示个别邮箱的未读邮件个数。 <br>7. 支持相关邮件用对话形式查看的“会话方式显示"！ <br>8. 收到新邮件通知时，轻轻一点搞定”回复/查看/删除”。 <br>9. 把邮件保存到存档盒里，让邮箱看起来干净清爽。想删除堆积在邮箱里的邮件又怕以后再找？轻轻一点存档（Archive)立即移动到存档盒。 <br>10. 通过桌面微件，不用打开应用也可以查看每天新消息。 <br>11. 700多种漂亮的表情图片，秀出你自己。 <br>12. 设定符合自己个性的电子签名。邮件发送时再邮件下端显示。 <br>13. 为Daum邮箱特别优化！收件确认，云端附件，Daum通讯录等功能方便使用。 <br>14. 在平板电脑上，也可以享受平板尺寸的应用画面。 </p><p>您所使用的 ID和密码，为您暗号化后保存在手机中。 </p><p>适合Android 2.3.3版本以上使用（swipe功能需要android 3.0以上版本） <br>使用时若有不便，请访问论坛或者facebook。 <br>* SolMail Recorder"> 475.    AndroRec Free Call Recorder  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=YorkerApps" title="YorkerApps">YorkerApps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.androglobe.androrec"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5hbmRyb2dsb2JlLmFuZHJvcmVjEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Now download previous versions of Androrec from http://yorkerapps.com/download.php<p>AndroRec is a very light weight yet powerful call recorder for android phones that records all your incoming and out going calls automatically and saves to your phone.</p><p>Features :</p><p>• Absolutely free and ad free<br>• Records all incoming and outgoing calls<br>• Option to enable/disable call recording<br>• No time limit for recording<br>• Log of all the recorded calls can be viewed from the application filtered by direction (In/Out) or by date.<br>• You can play or delete, archive or share the recordings from the application itself<br>• Log shows the contact number/name, exact date time as well as duration of your call making it easy to track all your calls from the application</p><p>Limitations :</p><p>• Can't record calls from Bluetooth<br>• May not record the opposite side voice in some phones due to hardware limitations<br>---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>• Please do not keep other call recorders active when Androrec is enabled. Otherwise Androrec will fail to record your calls.</p><p>• For Galaxy S2 users - It has been reported that once upgraded to android 4.0.3, Androrec no more works in mode 3, it will record in mode 1 from Mic only. Please don't rate badly. It is not the fault of Androrec.</p><p>• Please test the different recording modes to see which mode works best for you. Mode 3 is recommended for Samsung Galaxy S2 users having android version less than 4.0.</p><p>• For Motorola users -  I request you kindly don't give bad ratings as the problem is with Motorola hardware not with AndroRec call Recorder.</p><p>------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>Note : In Some phones the tone from the other side of the call might be a little low. If so, please enable speaker phone to get a clearer recording. This is a limitation from Android OS and the device manufacturers and has nothing to do with AndroRec call recorder. The recorded audio files can be found in your SD card in androrec folder.</p><p>Please leave a comment or drop a mail to support@yorkerapps.com if you find any problem with the application. Remember to include your device model, android version and the problem you are facing.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a 社區呼叫阻塞應用程序！呼叫控制是排名第一的呼叫攔截器和黑名單的Andr​​oid應用程序超過400萬的用戶和供電的FCC謝絕來電登記！<p>為社區提供呼叫控制。為什麼是呼叫控制比其他應用程序有什麼不同？<br>簡單地說，呼叫控制利用一個龐大的社區用戶積極舉報垃圾郵件自動封鎖最嚴重的罪犯的呼叫活動。我們把它叫做我們的社區黑名單 - ANT USB Service  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ANT%2B" title="ANT+">ANT+</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.dsi.ant.usbservice"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5kc2kuYW50LnVzYnNlcnZpY2UQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The ANT USB Service enables ANT wireless communication over a supported* ANT USB stick connected to your phone in conjunction with the ANT Radio Service. Among other use cases, ANT wireless technology allows communication with millions of ANT+ devices in existence, including some of the most popular sport, fitness and personal health applications such as a heart rate straps, running foot pods, cycling power meters, weight scales, blood pressure monitors and more. <br><p><br> Note: If you believe your device can support USB OTG, but the Play Store will not allow you to download this application then you can try manually installing the apk from our GitHub: https://github.com/ant-wireless/ANT-Android-SDKs/tree/master/ANT_Android_SDK/Services<br></p><p><br>More information on ANT and ANT+ technology is available on the ANT Radio Service download page: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dsi.ant.service.socket and on our website: http://www.thisisant.com/consumer/ant-101/ant-in-phones/<br></p><p><br>ANT+ enabled applications typically also require downloading the ANT+ Plugins http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dsi.ant.plugins.antplus. <br></p><p><br>*Known Limitations: <br>-Not compatible with "USB1" ANT sticks (sorry, we know a lot of you would like this but the USB1 uses a different USB controller which is not compatible with our newer versions)<br>-Connection of ANT USB sticks requires your phone to have USB Host support, if the Play Store allows you to install this ANT USB Service on your phone, your phone should support USB Host, and all that is required is a USB OTG cable and an ANT USB Stick. For detailed requirements please visit http://www.thisisant.com/consumer/ant-101/ant-in-phones/.<br>-Some devices (eg Motorola XOOM, Gateway TP-A60/Acer Iconia A500) will suspend the USB when the screen turns off, which will kill any ANT connections. This is a hardware limitation and a workaround must be added by individual apps.<br>-Applications using very old versions of our interfaces may only work with built-in ANT support and not support ANT devices attached via this USB Service. In this case your only option is to encourage the developers of that application to update their app to use a more recent version. (If your application is not detecting the USB stick, please test if one of our sample apps can detect it, for example you can install and test the ANT+ Plugins and the ANT+ Plugin Sampler. If you can connect to the stick with some apps, but not others, it probably indicates that the problem apps are using the very old legacy interfaces.)</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span href="/store/apps/details?id=com.vrin88.freewifiauto" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.vrin88.freewifiauto" title="免費的WiFi自動連接"> 502.    免費的WiFi自動連接  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=vrin88" title="vrin88">vrin88</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.vrin88.freewifiauto"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS52cmluODguZnJlZXdpZmlhdXRvEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  此應用程序可幫助無線上網，自動連接設置。無線網絡自動連接的應用程序可以幫助您自動連接到開放的WiFi網絡。機器人節省wifi的細節到無線上網的配置類。當WIFI是ON和SSID，傳遞關鍵細節與WiFi網絡相匹配，則機器人自動連接與特定的無線網絡。如何禁用自動連接功能？身後問這個問題的目的是，我有兩個配置的網絡（已保存），我想連接的WiFi按鈕點擊事件，但自動連接的android所連接的無線網絡本身的特性。<br>該應用程序支持：<br>*簡單的身份驗證方法（登錄+密碼），更多即將推出。<br>*可能要求SSID的支持。<br>*可下載的預配置支持的WiFi網絡。<p>可以使用WiFi開關切換為電訊盈科自動連接無線網絡,,電訊盈科無線網絡，電訊盈科的Wi-Fi無線,,無線!: 1.電訊盈科的WiFi自動連接PCCW-HKT（電訊盈科的WiFi自動連接，1000）。2.無線網絡，電訊盈科-HKT為您帶來自動連接功能！用簡單的一次性設置，您的設備會自動從電訊盈科時，Wi-Fi已檢測到的移動數據到Wi-Fi連接，沒有無線網絡中的每一次登錄，節省時間和享受高速網上衝浪體驗注：1。該服務僅適用於與電訊盈科的WiFi“自動連接”服務包訂閱。 2.如果遷出的WiFi覆蓋範圍，手機會自動連接到移動數據。</p><p>更多功能即將推出。</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.vrin88.freewifiauto" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.vrin88.freewifiauto" tabindex="-1"> <div </p><p>一。同聲翻譯功能在三個國家(Trilingual Interpreting) </p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 世界上第一個同聲翻譯功能在三個國家，外國人可以很容易地與對方在一個三路轉換器進行通信。 </p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 42個國家在世界上，以滿足全球化時代掛載一月主要語言。</p><p>二。動作口譯/筆譯功能(PLAY 私密短信，阅后即焚；加密电话，绝对防止被监听<br>私房照片，敢拍敢秀；私密相册，彻底杜绝艳照门<br>机密文档，重要笔记，私密日记，尽在隐私保险箱<p>你的手机安全吗？你的私密信息被人偷窥过吗？各种“门”事件是怎么发生的呢？你知道用微信或者短信发送重要信息有什么风险吗？…..? 不多说了，你先花2分钟看看可信能做什么，再来想 上面的问题吧。</p><p>可信集隐私保护与私密通信为一身，您可以:<br>★ 拨打加密电话(免费)，避免被监听<br>★ 发送能定时自我销毁的加密短信 <br>★ 可以回收或远程删除已发出的短信<br>★ 放心发送私密照片视频，完全可控<br>★ 保存私密照片、视频到加密保险箱<br>★ 加密保存私密通讯录,通话记录&amp;短信<br>★ 安全保存机密文档、私密笔记&amp;日记 </p><p><br>☞ 保护私密信息 <br>每个人都有私密信息，每个人的手机上保存了越来越多的私密信息。这些私密信息随时都可能被不该看到的人看到，被黑客窃取。可信采用军用等级的高强度加密算法，把你的私密信息如私密通讯录、敏感照片与视频、机密文档、笔记、私密日记、 私密短信放到一个绝对可靠的保险箱中。只有你本人用正确的密码才能看到这些私密信息。即使你的手机丢失了，或者有人借用你的手机，没有人能够看到这些私密。<br> <br>可信甚至还提供一个安全可靠的密码管理器，把你生活中用到的各种各样密码放到可信里面保管。</p><p>☞ 安全通信交流<br>你知道吗，你发出的每个短信，打的每通电话，在某个地方被存档、被监听着。到电信营业厅能打出你全部的通话记录、短信记录。你现在用的通信手段是没有任何私密的！想想“棱镜门”吧。可信绕过电信运营商的电话网络与短信网关，用军用等级的高强度加密算法，百变的加密策略，实现了绝对安全可靠的加密电话与加密短信。任何人，包括可信公司本身都无法截获，监听你用可信打出的电话，发出的短信。 </p><p>☞ 安全私密短信<br>除了短信本身加密，金身不破之外，可信还能让你彻底控制你发出的短信。你能知道对方什么时侯读了你的短信。你能够回收或者远程删除你发出的短信。你甚至可以把发出的短信设置上自我销毁能力，阅后即焚！再也不担心有人把你发的短信转发，甚至截屏放到网上。</p><p>☞ 私密信息分享<br>你与亲密好友分享搞怪、搞笑、私密的照片吗？重要的商业信息怎么发给你的商业伙伴，用邮件、短信、微信？用可信发照片，对方看完后就消失得无影无踪。即使你允许对方保存，对方也不能转发、导出、截屏，你还能在任何时候远程删除。用可信发送重要文档，对方看完后就自动销毁了。可信让你做到，你的信息你做主！</p><p>☞ 完全免费使用 <br>可信是完全免费的，免费下载，免费使用。可信里面也没有烦人的条幅广告。绿色应用，放心使用。</p><p>★★★★★ 功能特点 ★★★★★</p><p>★ 访问控制<br>   ✔ 双重密码保护 <br>   ✔ 可以设置欺骗性的假密码<br>   ✔ 自动拍照与定位入侵者<br>   ✔ 摇一摇手机，快速加锁</p><p>★ 保护私密照片与视频 <br>   ✔ (※ Android 3.0 and later)</p><p>・ View mode<br>When opening specified pages and sites, you can have them automatically switch user agent and open in another app. (※From the menu button)</p><p>・ Extensions<br>Layout of pages can be changed, and special functions can be added using extensions. Download from the Extensions Gallery ( http://extensions.fenrir-inc.com/ ). Installing extensions can be completed by simply tapping the install button.</p><p>・ Fenrir Pass<br>This is a free cloud service that can be used to automatically sync bookmarks with Sleipnir on Windows, Mac, iPhone and Windows Phone, and also use a number of Web services.<br>Supported services: Twitter / Facebook / Google+ / LinkedIn / Tumblr / Flickr / Readability / Instapaper / Pocket / Dropbox / Evernote / SkyDrive / Google Reader</p><p>【Other functions】</p><p>・ Ad-block (※ Android 3.0 and later)<br>・ Optimized design for smartphone and tablet devices<br>・ Customize the UI to what you like<br>・ Save memory and stable tabs by limiting tab loading<br>・ Protect tabs by double tapping<br>・ tab groups to manage tabs<br>・ Various site search engines merged into one<br>・ "Usual Sites" for quickly accessing your favorite sites<br>・ Download files<br>・ Full-screen mode<br>・ Import bookmarks from browsers<br>・ Sort bookmarks<br>・ bookmarks editing mode<br>・ Manage FenrirFS bookmarks with labels<br>・ Facebook linking<br>・ Backup tabs, bookmarks, settings<br>・ Close application by holding down back key<br>・ Open with other browser (※From address bar long press menu)<br>・ Search in pages (※From address bar long press menu)<br>・ Copy title, URL (※From address bar long press menu)<br>・ Open one level above URL (※From address bar long press menu)</p><p>【About Sleipnir Mobile】</p><p>Sleipnir Mobile for Android is the one step browser that once you try you can't let go of, made in Japan!
